ticket.title: ActionView::TemplateFinder: Allow configurable number of symlinks in view paths
ticket.original-body: The current ActionView::TemplateFinder allows for only one Symlink Level in the view paths, when it caches the view templates. This poses problems if you have multiple symlink levels. The attached patches allow the number of symlink levels to be followed and configured via config.symlink_levels in config/environment.rb.
